Node.Description: FBM Noise with two additional Noise Drivers

Attribute.Name: Size
Attribute.Description: The general feature size

Attribute.Name: octaves
Attribute.Description: Visual complexitity of noise

Attribute.Name: lacunarity
Attribute.Description: Frequency spacing between successive octaves

Attribute.Name: Amp
Attribute.Description: Each successive octave gets multiplied gain*amplitute, smaller values result in less contrast between frequencies

Attribute.Name: FreqOffset
Attribute.Description: Frequency Offset

Attribute.Name: gain
Attribute.Description: Each successive octave gets multiplied gain*amplitute, smaller values result in less contrast for the overal result

Attribute.Name: Threshold
Attribute.Description: Threshold of final result

Attribute.Name: Clip
Attribute.Description: extends the threshold box by a fixed value up and down

Attribute.Name: Absolut
Attribute.Description: By default positive and negative noise values will all be treated as positive making for a denser noise. This will remove any negative noise values

Attribute.Name: Invert
Attribute.Description: Inverts the Noise result before ColorA+B are applied

Attribute.Name: PreviewA
Attribute.Description: Shows you the Result from the Fractal in Handle A

Attribute.Name: HandleA
Attribute.Description: Which feature from Base Noise to be driven by secondary noise

Attribute.Name: ASize
Attribute.Description: The general feature size for HandleA

Attribute.Name: AOctaves
Attribute.Description: Visual complexitity of noise

Attribute.Name: ALacunarity
Attribute.Description: Frequency spacing between successive octaves

Attribute.Name: Aamp
Attribute.Description: Each successive octave gets multiplied gain*amplitute, smaller values result in less contrast between frequencies

Attribute.Name: AFreqOffset
Attribute.Description: Frequency Offset for HandleA

Attribute.Name: AGain
Attribute.Description: Each successive octave gets multiplied gain*amplitute, smaller values result in less contrast for the overal result

Attribute.Name: SeedA
Attribute.Description: Randomize position

Attribute.Name: nMinA
Attribute.Description: New minumum Value for Handle A

Attribute.Name: nMaxA
Attribute.Description: New maximum Value for Handle A

Attribute.Name: ClipA
Attribute.Description: By default positive and negative noise values will all be treated as positive making for a denser noise. This will remove any negative noise values

Attribute.Name: EnforceA
Attribute.Description: When Clip Negative is turned on, this will enforce the clipped areas trhoughout the entire fractal, so any further modification only affects the existing shapes

Attribute.Name: PreviewB
Attribute.Description: Shows you the Result from the Fractal in Handle B

Attribute.Name: HandleB
Attribute.Description: Which feature from Base Noise to be driven by tertiary noise

Attribute.Name: BSize
Attribute.Description: The general feature size for HandleB

Attribute.Name: BOctaves
Attribute.Description: Visual complexitity of noise

Attribute.Name: BLacunarity
Attribute.Description: Frequency spacing between successive octaves

Attribute.Name: Bamp
Attribute.Description: Each successive octave gets multiplied gain*amplitute, smaller values result in less contrast between frequencies

Attribute.Name: BFreqOffset
Attribute.Description: Frequency Offset HandleB

Attribute.Name: BGain
Attribute.Description: Each successive octave gets multiplied gain*amplitute, smaller values result in less contrast for the overal result

Attribute.Name: SeedB
Attribute.Description: Randomize position

Attribute.Name: nMinB
Attribute.Description: New minumum Value for Handle B

Attribute.Name: nMaxB
Attribute.Description: New maximum Value for Handle B

Attribute.Name: ClipB
Attribute.Description: By default positive and negative noise values will all be treated as positive making for a denser noise. This will remove any negative noise values

Attribute.Name: EnforceB
Attribute.Description: When Clip Negative is turned on, this will enforce the clipped areas trhoughout the entire fractal, so any further modification only affects the existing shapes. This can work in combination with Propagate Additive

Attribute.Name: uv
Attribute.Description: Runs the noise 2d uv based, use offset/scale x/y and rotate z

Attribute.Name: trB
Attribute.Description: Applies the transformation to the base fractal

Attribute.Name: trhA
Attribute.Description: Applies the transformation to the fractal in Handel A

Attribute.Name: trhB
Attribute.Description: Applies the transformation to the fractal in Handel B
